content: Before I waste my time viewing this video, what's the point? That Republicans rant now and then? And Democrats never do. One persons rant is another ones way of making a point. Liberals called the following quote a right wing rant. Others saw them as the opinion of a patriotic American. "Extremism in the defense of liberty is no vice. And moderation in the pursuit of justice is no virtue." Barry Goldwater
